#WeAreNotTheVoid

Meet the team

We’re a team of creatives, writers, degens and big thinkers who want to create cool shit, make new friends and build a legacy to be proud of. We’re based in the UK and France (Dimension #CR15513).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”110px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/PJ-Cooper-hex.png” alt=”PJ Cooper” title_text=”PJ-Cooper” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PJ Cooper

Lead Artist and Founder

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PJ Cooper hails from Dimension #CW122HN. Following stints working with brands such as Apple, Adobe, Disney, Bentley, the BBC, NHS, Vitality and Sony Playstation as a designer, coder and product manager, PJ made the decision to create PTCo. with some of the talented friends he made along the way.

Likes: Dogs, karma, clean cutlery, The Prodigy, hot tea, doxed founders
Dislikes: Tardiness, flaky skin, warm weather, cold tea

@MrPJCooper

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”90px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Ulysees-Funk-hex.png” alt=”Ulysees Funk” title_text=”Ulysees-Funk” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ulysees Funk

Concept Designer and Writer

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ulysees Funk hails from Dimension #DA68JD. Funk has worked as a professional illustrator and author for over 35 years publishing books and comics for the underbelly of society (Stanley Bones and the Great Dinosaur Mystery, Dead Fly Pie). He is officially an enigma.

Likes: Cats, Planetary Annihilation, books over 1000 pages, doing the laundry, The Cardigans. Doodling.
Dislikes: The monarchy, fascists, people who think a luxury chateau wedding with 150 guests costs less than $100k

@DrGrippa

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”90px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Dan-the-Dev-hex.png” alt=”Dan” title_text=”Dan-the-Dev-hex” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dan Thedev

CTO

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dan is a highly experienced web3 developer. Dan has worked on 20+ smart contracts in the last 12 months alone, for some big name projects you’ll probably have heard of.  Dan manages our team of engineers. He’s our guardian angel and the bedrock of our organisation.

Likes: Warm weather
Dislikes: Long plane flights

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”90px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Darryl-hex.png” alt=”Darryl Sparey” title_text=”Darryl” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Darryl Sparey

Chief Marketing Officer

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Darryl Sparey hails from Dimension #BH1. He’s an award winning PR maestro. Seriously, check out his Twitter. It’s full of awards. He builds hype, brands, and blue-chips. He’s the excitable one of the team.

Likes: Geordies, Tweeting, comics, people who say please and thanks
Dislikes: Negativity, whiskey, bad manners, small yappy dogs

@DarrylSparey

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”90px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Danielle-Saunders-hex.png” alt=”Danielle Saunders” title_text=”Danielle-Saunders-hex” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Danielle Saunders

Marketing and Community Manager

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dannielle has worked with brands such as JD Sports, Gap and M&C Saatchi. She has artistic roots with a degree in Contemporary Art Practice, and graduated from the UAL with a PGC in Design for Visual Communication in 2017.

Likes: Building communities, green, cats, art, NFTs, cherryade
Dislikes: Rugs, rugging

@dl_coco

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_padding=”90px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Dan-Cholerton-hex.png” alt=”Dan Cholerton” title_text=”Dan-Cholerton-hex” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1em” header_letter_spacing=”-3px” header_line_height=”0em” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dan Cholerton

Marketing and Community Manager

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dan leads our Marketing and Community Management team. Dan has delivered major campaigns for Premier League Football clubs and sports brands such as Puma and Gymbox. Evey one say gm to Dan please, he likes the attention!

Likes: Footy, chocolate, Twitter, Jon Snow
Dislikes: Gremlins, the bottom of the barrel, strange smells

@danchol

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are not THE VOID

We are in no way affiliated with those messed-up dudes that are trying to destroy the Pandimensional multiverse. Don’t listen to the rumours.

We’re based in the UK and France (Dimension #CR15513).PJ Cooper Lead Artist and FounderPJ Cooper hails from Dimension #CW122HN. Following stints working with brands […]
